details.description: Owing to technical reasons, the British Embassy is not currently able to operate from its offices at 34 Baghramyan Avenue. Until these technical issues are resolved, the Embassy will operate from a temporary location in Yerevan.
details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

Consular section

The Consular Section is open Monday to Friday 0930 to 1230 by appointment only except in an emergency. For Notarial, documentary and other non-urgent consular services appointments should be made online via our official website: www.consular-appointments.service.gov.uk For general Consular enquiries please contact: Consular.Yerevan@fco.gov.uk If you require emergency Consular assistance out of office hours please call +37410 264301 and choose the option for an emergency involving a British National.

Disabled access is available. Customers should contact the British Embassy Yerevan in advance of their appointment for assistance.

2017 public holidays

The embassy will be closed on the following days in 2017:

Monday 2 January (In lieu of Sunday 1 January) New Year’s Day
Friday 6 January Armenian Christmas Day
Wednesday 8 March Women’s Day
Friday 14 April Friday before Easter Sunday
Monday 17 April Easter Monday
Monday 24 April Genocide Memorial Day
Monday 1 May First Monday in May
Tuesday 9 May Victory Day
Monday 29 May Last Monday in May
Wednesday 5 July Constitution Day
Monday 28 August August Bank Holiday
Thursday 21 September Independence Day
Monday 25 December Christmas Day
Tuesday 26 December Boxing Day
